entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:50 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
